column5: saw this on an ice fishing forum...thought i'd share with yall
Can't see the vid from herre...but I'm pretty sure it's the one in the jungle with a post hole digger instead of an auger...no?  Simply incedible!!!
Where there is a will, there is a way.
That's cool.  I was just talking with a buddy the other day about going out into the Pigeon Lake catails and fishing down through them for monster bass (as a lark of course), now.....Hmmmm.

This also happens here in Canada. Labrador and Newfoundland in the thick Guweity and Floating bogs we would as kids cut holes in the floating stuff to gain access to large Brook Trout (Mud Trout) but landlocked ones  down there. Basically the same. Eskimos do this for Char in the bogs as well.  They also do this in the thick stuff in the everglades in Southern US for Catfish etc.
Thats AWESOME,..but where are the huts? lol  Nice Video!!!
Now there's another reason to move to Brazil!
Those fish are scary looking   Do they even have eyes?

Simon,  I've seen this one before, I think it was posted last year on this board but what an amazing way of fishing.... beats the freezing our ass off we have up here  Oh Bill.... channel cat for sure Jacques
Look like tiger shovelnose cats to me.... make a nice addition to a monster aquarium for sure!  Burt
